name: Avenue
address: 7-9 St James's St, London SW1A 1EE, UK
description: Contemporary American dishes and wines in a Manhattan-styled room with art and sculptures.

reviews.author: Charlie Gibbons
reviews.comment: If you are a group of women who like £15 unlimited prosecco this is the place for you. Very loud however for a family meal. Food was nice however we did get cold burgers. Being rather english we didnt complain and blamed it on then business of the resturant.

reviews.author: Kirsty
reviews.comment: Lovely service and delicious food. Great for a special occasion.

reviews.author: Robert
reviews.comment: Nice bottomless brunch. Food is a lot better than most of the competitors.

reviews.author: Jenny
reviews.comment: The staff were very attentive with the bottomless prosecco, topping up our glasses before we finished the full glass. The food was fine but nothing to rave about. All in all it was a fun day out and the atmosphere was great. The only negative thing was that I told the restaurant that it was a 30th birthday on more than one occasion and they promised a dessert plate which we never got.
